snippet: President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan offered a concrete public signal that foreign troops would remain welcome in the coming years.
abstract: Pres Hami Karzai says Afghanistan is ready to let United States and its allies keep military bases there after end of NATO combat mission in 2014, offering concrete public signal that foreign troops will remain welcome there; American reaction is less than positive, as officials say that Karzai's comments reflect his desire for larger troop presence than United States is willing to commit.
lead_paragraph: President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan offered a concrete public signal that foreign troops would remain welcome in the coming years.
